name: Mussels Marinara
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, main course, mussels, seafood
recipeIngredient: 1 jalapeno pepper, stemmed, seeded and minced
2 teaspoons salt, plus more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Steam the mussels (see recipe). Set aside the mussels and broth. Heat the olive oil in a medium-size skillet. Add the onion, shallots and jalapeno. Saute until soft, about 5 minutes. Add the tomatoes, 1/4 cup of the reserved mussel broth and the rosemary.

Cook, stirring often, until tomatoes are soft and sauce is thick, about 15 minutes. Stir in the salt and pepper. Add the mussels and cook for about 1 minute. Divide among 4 plates and serve immediately.
